data.name: Exiori
data.detailed_description:
Exiori is a JRPG with turn based combat that contains hentai elements, It also has an interesting story that will take place throughout 8 separate chapters.

Follow the story of Krosuji, a young man with amnesia who was mysteriously thrust into another unknown world known as Teseldaima two years ago. Battle alongside or against new and old allies/enemies from Euclyca and other Team Syukino works. Battle throughout 8 different chapters as Krosuji tries to find his way back home, locate the legendary relic known as the Exiori and get revenge.

Embark on a multi-world adventure that features several cameos from different Team Syukino games.

--Current Implemented Features--

-Three Story Chapters.

-Turn-Based Combat.

-A colorful cast of characters with 5 in battle at once.

-Wonderful Soundtrack.

-Several optional NSFW Straight, Gay, Bi, Lesbian sex scenes.

-Ability to turn off random encounters on the fly in options.

-Limit Breaks.

-A big over-world to explore.

-Character Bios.

-Originally drawn characters and assets.

-Several Weapons, Items and Armor to unlock and equip.

--Planned Features--

-Eight Story Chapters.

-Turn-Based Combat.

-A colorful cast of characters with 5 in battle at once.

-Wonderful Soundtrack.

-Several optional NSFW Straight, Gay, Bi, Lesbian sex scenes.

-Ability to turn off random encounters on the fly in options.

-Limit Breaks.

-A big over-world to explore.

-Originally drawn characters and assets.

-Several Weapons, Items and Armor to unlock and equip.

data.short_description: Depart on a multi-world adventure to find the legendary relic known as the Exiori to avenge your friend and return home.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS: Microsoft WindowsÂ® 8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGL / VRAM 1GB or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

data.legal_notice: Exiori is the sole property of Team Syukino.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains 18+ optional sexual content that includes; but not limited to; Yaoi, Yuri and Hentai. You may choose what you like each time or avoid all sexual content altogether.
